greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of harmonic mean H(n,2), n>= 0.
comment: a(n) = numerator(H(n,2)) = numerator(4*n/(n+2)), n>=0, with H(n,2) the harmonic mean of n and 2.
The corresponding denominator is given in A000265(n+2), n>= 0.
a(n+2), n>=0, is the second column (m=2) of the triangle A227041.
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jul 01 2013
